synopsis.text: Carrying musical instrument cases as a disguise, a peculiar group known as the "Jaegers" arrive at Tokyo station in 1930. Their mission: to hunt down vampires. Among them is Yuliy, a werewolf with a calm demeanor and a unique aura. Yuliy's home village was destroyed by vampires, and now he seeks vengeance. The Jaegers and Yuliy become embroiled in a fierce battle over a mysterious artifact known as the "Arc of Sirius." As the conspiracy surrounding the artifact deepens, the truth of its power remains uncertain. Will Yuliy and the Jaegers be able to claim the Arc of Sirius before the vampires do, or will they fall victim to its mysterious allure? This action-thriller anime promises to keep viewers on the edge of their seats.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
